âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Text-to-Video generation â€¢ Text-Image-to-Video generation (Allegro-TI2V) â€¢ Generates 6-second videos at 15 FPS and 720p resolution â€¢ Open-sourced models available on Hugging Face â€¢ Integration with Hugging Face diffusers library
ðŸ“– Summary: Allegro is a Python-based text-to-video generation model capable of producing up to 6-second videos at 720p resolution and 15 FPS from text prompts. A variant, Allegro-TI2V, extends this by incorporating first-frame and optional last-frame image inputs.
